MAN.TITLE: grayplot
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: 2D plot of a surface using colors

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : real row vectors of size n1 and n2.
: real matrix of size (n1,n2). z(i,j) is the value of the surface at the point (x(i),y(j)).
: This represents a sequence of statements key1=value1, key2=value2,... where key1, key2,... can be one of the following: rect, nax, strf or axesflag and frameflag (see plot2d).

DESCRIPTION.P: grayplot makes a 2D plot of the surface given by z on a grid defined by x and y. Each rectangle on the grid is filled with a gray or color level depending on the average value of z on the corners of the rectangle.
Enter the command grayplot() to see a demo.
